languages.text: "Вы своевольно правили записи в бортовом журнале и запретили офицерам докладывать об этом Абеляру".

traits.locale_text: "Вы своевольно правили записи в бортовом журнале и запретили офицерам докладывать об этом Абеляру".

languages.text: "You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Вы своевольно правили записи в бортовом журнале и запретили офицерам докладывать об этом Абеляру".

traits.locale_text: "You were willfully changing entries in the vessel's logbook and forbade the offices from reporting to Abelard."
"You were willfully changing entries in the vessel's logbook and forbade the offices from reporting to Abelard."
"You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."
"You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."
"You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."

languages.text: “你一直在故意更改舰船日志的内容，而且禁止任何军官向阿贝拉德报告此事。”
languages.original_text: "You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."

traits.locale_text: “你一直在故意更改舰船日志的内容，而且禁止任何军官向阿贝拉德报告此事。”

languages.text: «Ha estado alterando entradas de la bitácora de la nave y prohibiendo a los oficiales que informaran a Abelard».
languages.original_text: "You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."

traits.locale_text: «Ha estado alterando entradas de la bitácora de la nave y prohibiendo a los oficiales que informaran a Abelard».

languages.text: 「カシア殿は航海日誌の記入を故意に変更し、それをアベラルドに報告することを士官に禁じていた」
languages.original_text: "You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア殿は航海日誌の記入を故意に変更し、それをアベラルドに報告することを士官に禁じていた」

languages.text: "Ihr habt vorsätzlich Einträge im Schiffslogbuch geändert und Offizieren untersagt, Abelard darüber Meldung zu machen."
languages.original_text: "You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt vorsätzlich Einträge im Schiffslogbuch geändert und Offizieren untersagt, Abelard darüber Meldung zu machen."

languages.text: « Vous avez délibérément altéré les entrées du journal de bord du vaisseau et empêché les officiers de faire leur rapport à Abélard. »
languages.original_text: "You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez délibérément altéré les entrées du journal de bord du vaisseau et empêché les officiers de faire leur rapport à Abélard. »

languages.text: "Geminin seyir defterindeki girdileri kasıtlı olarak değiştiriyor ve subayların Abelard'a rapor vermesini yasaklıyormuşsun."
languages.original_text: "You have been wilfully changing entries in the ship's logbook and forbidding officers from reporting it to Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "Geminin seyir defterindeki girdileri kasıtlı olarak değiştiriyor ve subayların Abelard'a rapor vermesini yasaklıyormuşsun."
